WorkItem.Description:
Hi all,
I can't use the code framework, it doesn't even start.
All I get is a Win7 popup message telling me to search for a fix on the internet (that's the win7 generic popup to handle the software crashes).
Anyway, this is the text of the error.
 
 
Firma problema:

Hello

We have just released a fix for this problem. Could you please reopen the sample browser to get the auto-update, and let me know if it works for you now?

Thanks
Jialiang Ge
Update fixed the problem for my system
Forgot to mention one important point: Thanks for fixing it

Hi,
it works like a charme!
Thanks
Great to know that it works well now :)  Thanks for reporting the issue!
